tool_description: Calculates comprehensive quality performance metrics including precision, accuracy, turnaround time, and error rates for laboratory operations.

metric_type.description: Type of quality metric to calculate (precision, accuracy, turnaround_time, error_rate, reliability)

data_source_ids.description: Array of data source identifiers for metric calculation

calculation_period_days.description: Period in days for metric calculation (1-365)

target_value.description: Target or goal value for the metric

error_messages: Invalid metric type: metric_type must be one of [precision, accuracy, turnaround_time, error_rate, reliability].
Invalid calculation period: calculation_period_days must be between 1 and 365.
Insufficient data: Not enough valid data points for reliable metric calculation.
Data source error: One or more data_source_ids could not be accessed or are invalid.
Target value out of range: target_value must be within reasonable bounds for the specified metric type.
Calculation error: Unable to complete metric calculation due to data quality issues.
usage: Specify metric type, data sources, and calculation parameters. The tool computes quality metrics with statistical confidence intervals and trend analysis.

metric_id.description: Unique identifier for this metric calculation

trend_direction.description: Trend direction over calculation period (improving, declining, stable)

data_points_used.description: Number of valid data points used in calculation
